title: Sen. Lindsay Graham Enters Crowded Field Of GOP Presidential Hopefuls
teaser: Republican primary voters rank foreign policy as their top issue in this election, and no one takes a more hawkish stance than South Carolina Sen. Lindsay Graham. Using that platform, Graham announced his intention to run for president Monday in the small town where he grew up.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
